# React TypeScript Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a React TypeScript project built with Vite for fast development and optimized builds.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold React TypeScript project with Vite
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Set up project structure
- [ ] Add React Router
- [ ] Create sample components
- [ ] Verify compilation
- [ ] Create and run dev task

## Tech Stack
- **React 18+** - UI library
- **TypeScript** - Type safety
- **Vite** - Build tool and dev server
- **React Router** - Client-side routing

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with TypeScript
- Implement proper type definitions for all props and state
- Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
- Use ES6+ features
